tool_description: Evaluates building measurements and features against applicable accessibility codes including ADA, IBC, state and local requirements to identify compliance gaps.

measurement_session_id.description: Measurement session to evaluate for compliance

jurisdiction.description: Geographic jurisdiction: federal, state code, or specific city/county name

building_use_group.description: IBC use group: A, B, E, F, H, I, M, R, S, U or mixed

construction_year.description: Year building was constructed (affects applicable code versions)

error_messages: Invalid measurement session: Provide a valid measurement session ID from Accessibility Measurement Tool.
Unsupported jurisdiction: Specify a recognized jurisdiction or use 'federal' for ADA-only analysis.
Invalid use group: Use standard IBC use group classifications (A, B, E, F, H, I, M, R, S, U).
Construction year out of range: Year must be between 1900 and current year.
Missing code data: Required accessibility codes for this jurisdiction are not available in the system.
usage: Provide building and measurement data along with jurisdiction and use classification. The tool compares measurements against applicable accessibility standards.

compliance_report_id.description: Unique identifier for this compliance evaluation

violation_categories.description: Types of violations found: entrance, egress, restroom, parking, signage, etc.

applicable_standards.description: List of accessibility standards used in evaluation
